message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $120. Considering its quality and unique features, I am offering it to you for $150. This is a special introductory price, and I hope you find it fair. Let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product, but I am only able to commit to a maximum of $120. I hope this revised offer meets within your expectations.
